name: TaeKwonDo Master
overview: TaeKwonDo Master is a digitized fighting game. The game features three modes - single, duel (2 players) and tournament (3 to 6 players) and allows the player to choose one of six characters. Each character is described by height, weight and special blow and uses its own set of four unique moves. In contrast to the one year later released ECS side-scrolling version of the game, titled Super TaeKwonDo Master, TaeKwonDo Master uses enhanced AGA graphics and is played on a single screen board with 3rd-person perspective.
